```{r setup,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE}
if (!exists("indent")) {
	indent = '##'
}
if (exists("testing")) {
	example("alpha", "psych")
  obj = a4
}
```



##`r indent` Reliability

##`r indent` 95% Confidence Interval
```{r}
if (!is.null(obj$total$ase)) {
  pander::pander(data.frame(lower = obj$total$raw_alpha - 1.96 * obj$total$ase, 
             estimate = obj$total$raw_alpha, 
             upper = obj$total$raw_alpha + 1.96 * 
  obj$total$ase))
}
```

```{r}
pander::pander(obj$total)
```

##`r indent`  Reliability if an item is dropped:

```{r}
pander::pander(obj$alpha.drop, row.names = FALSE)
```

##`r indent` Item statistics

```{r}
pander::pander(obj$item.stats, row.names = FALSE)
```

##`r indent` Non missing response frequency for each item

```{r}
pander::pander(obj$response.freq, row.names = FALSE)
```
